recipeDescriptionLines.recipeDescriptionLine: Green Chutney is a spicy chutney made with mainly coriander and mint leaves. It is mainly used for preparing all types of chat and acts as a spread in many types of sandwiches.
The preparation of this chutney is very simple and instant. The main ingredients coriander and mint leaves makes this chutney quite nutritional.

Mint is a very good cleanser for the blood and soothes the digestive tract. Coriander leaves is a wonderful source of Iron, dietary fiber, Vitamin C and K. Coriander lowers bad cholesterol (LDL) and increases the levels of good cholesterol (HDL).

procedureSteps.stepDescription: Wash coriander, mint leaves and green chillies well.
Grind all ingredients to smooth paste. Sugar and Oil helps in retaining the fresh green color and taste for a longer time.
The chutney can be stored in refrigerator for up to 3 weeks.  The chutney goes well with all kind of chaats.
